title: Coronavirus Updates - Trump's Kissing Comments, Cow Hugs & An Early Warning for Trump Donors
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - Trump's Kissing Comments, Cow Hugs & An Early Warning for Trump Donors
description:
President Trump tells rally-goers he wants to kiss them, therapeutic cow-hugging surges in popularity, and Trump reportedly gave wealthy donors advance notice about the COVID-19 threat.
